remarks: The outer product of two vectors, expressed as ` | A >. ` ` <. B | ` in Dirac notation.  See ~ df-kb .  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
kbfval $p |- ( ( A e. ~H /\ B e. ~H ) -> ( A ketbra B ) = ( x e. ~H |-> ( ( x .ih B ) .h A ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
